content: july 2024 i m happy to say that after a false start with my choice of yarn i have now completed my second colourway of the grace blanket i have also completely overhauled the pattern it s still a free download but is also available to buy on my website as a 26 page full colour printed booklet for my new version i used wendy supreme dk 100g balls 295m 10 x cream 3 x duck egg 2 x rose 2 x soft peach 2 x natural this yarn is available to buy as a pack from blacksheepwools com anita x june 2022 hello anita again i m delighted to say that the grace pattern is once again available to download on my new website i have completely refreshed the original pattern and it is now a much more printer-friendly 27 pages i m still working on the new colour way slowly but have added some pictures of my wip anita x november 2021 hello anita here i will be making a new version of this blanket starting in december 2021 and i will make the 49 page pattern available again as a free download if you would like to see progress pictures of the new blanket follow me on instagram @madebyanita the original blanket stylecraft special dk 19 balls 300m balls 10x 100g balls in 1005 cream 3x 100g balls in 1023 raspberry 2x 100g balls in 1218 parchment 2x 100g balls in 1240 soft peach 2x 100g balls in 1080 pale rose alternative yarns - any dk sport light worsted 8 ply or similar 4mm hook* *if you are using an alternative yarn use the recommended hook size for that yarn the blanket may not be the same finished size
